title: New: Miserable – Bell Jar
body:
**Kristina Esfandiari**‘s (former vocalist of **Whirr**) solo debut song, feels like a punch in the face.

**Bell Jar** is a dark whispering tale that ends up as a screaming howl of a liberating nightmare; a pitch black shoegaze folk fusion. Take **Chelsea Wolfe**, **Zola Jesus** and **Deafheaven** put them in a blender and the chaotic masterpiece that will rise is **Miserable**….

**Halloween Dream EP** will drop on a limited 7” on February 18th via [**Native Sound**](http://thenativesound.limitedrun.com/products/523173).

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/127606586″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
